name: action
description: Possible actions: placeSellOffer(sellerPK, toSellPK, price, tag), buy(buyerPK, toBuyPK), cancelOffer(forSalePK), updateFees(flatFee, percentageFee).

name: sellerPK
description: (action: placeSellOffer) Seller's public key to receive payment for a sold account.

name: toSellPK
description: (action: placeSellOffer) Public key of an account which the seller wants to sell.

name: tag
description: (action: placeSellOffer) Tag to help with browsing wallets.

name: buyerPK
description: (action: buy) Public key of buyer's wallet that pays for the purchase.

name: toBuyPK
description: (action: buy) Public key of a wallet that the buyer is buying.

name: forSalePK
description: (action: cancelOffer) Public key of a wallet which sell offer should be canceled.

name: flatFee
description: (action: updateFees) Flat fee is used in placeSellOffer and cancelOffer.

name: percentageFee
description: (action: updateFees) percentageFee is paid by the buyer from the wallet price.
